Room.Name: Entrance Chamber
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a small chamber at the entrance to the underground city.
Room.LongDescription: The residents of the underground city guard this room well, and turn back all those who would raid their home. There are few portals to the sub- terrainin city, so it is easy for the denizens to keep track of any who might enter here. Often they will try to overpower visitors by sheer numbers, so stay hidden when possible.
